name: Roguezilla
description:
Important Note: There's an explosion sound in the game that is about 2x as loud as it should be. This only occurs near the end of the game - I can't fix this as the game is submitted to 7DRL2023. If you don't want a jump don't put the volume really high.

Stomp around a city trampling buildings while looking for stolen eggs.

The response to your presence will escalate with time - police at first, then the military show up. The timer starts when you make landfall.

Being submerged will heal you.

There are food libraries scattered around the city which  will give you a small health boost when stomped.

Once you have collected all the eggs, leave the city and swim to the edge of the map to exit.

There's a button to run in full screen - the sprites should be less squashed then

Controls: Use WSAD to move, QEZC to move diagonally. Or use numpad keys or vi keys. The fullstop/period key . will skip a turn.

Note: The island is to the north east of where you spawn.

Made for the 7DRL Challenge 2023

Sounds effects generated with jsfxr - 8 bit sound maker and online sfx generator

Sprites created with Aseprite - Animated sprite editor & pixel art tool

Game made withn Unity, using Tilemaps
